snippet: In his talk Salman Rushdie lamented both a certain human tendency to value material well-being over intellectual freedom, a tension other panels at the festival attempted to confront as well.
abstract: In his talk Salman Rushdie lamented both a certain human tendency to value material well-being over intellectual freedom, a tension other panels at the festival attempted to confront as well.

headline.main: Rushdie Brings PEN Festival to Close
